revised_title: The Refraction and Dispersion of Air for the Visible Spectrum
tldr: This article presents a study on the refraction and dispersion of air for the visible spectrum. The authors conducted precise measurements using interferometry and Fabry-Perot etalons to determine the refractive index of air under controlled conditions of temperature, pressure, and composition. The research aimed to improve the accuracy of previous measurements and provide a better understanding of the relationship between refractive index, density, and dispersion of transparent media.
